main.name: Stephanie Wang
main.description: recently graduated from University of Alberta (Master of Engineering in Software Engineering and Intelligent Syetem)
main.bio: First and foremost, I love, and I enjoy writing code. Ever since my first time learning C in high school, I fell in love with the feeling every time the compile ran successfully. Since then, it is always not enough with coding. For me, coding is technically a problem-solving skill that I have to get through the problems, solve it, and make it run. That's why I love it. This passion carried me through my education. When I had an exciting coding project, I can code for hours and hours without checking the time or checking on my social media until I finished the project.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.degree: • M.Eng. in Software Engineering & Intelligent Systems (ECE Dept.)
education.description: I've taken multiple Software Engineering and Machine learning courses at school as well as taken online web development courses on Udemy on my own time.

Although I was under Electrical Engineering program, I was mainly focused on Machine Learning and Deep Learning in computer vision during my third and fourth year. I've also received more than 10 awards in academic excellence and fundings during these four years.

work.title: part-time job
work.description: Examined and updated the product software. Conducted market survey to determine an appropriate price for product.

publication.title: [1] Steffi Agino Priyanka, Yuan-Kai Wang, Chieh Wang, "Effective Image Denoising Using Symmetric Convolution-Deconvolution Architecture," Computer Vision, Graphics, and Image Processing, Tainan, Taiwan, 2018.

projects.title: Implementation and Anlysis of Deep Learning in Human Detection

mainprojects.title: Music Search Engine (Full Stack project)
mainprojects.skills: Python, ReactJs (Javascript, HTML, CSS), Redux, Neo4j, Flask API
mainprojects.description: This is a music search engine for searching and listening to related music. Me and my project partner scrap all of the music data from MusicBrainz and IMSLP, use Neo4j graph database to manage the data, and use Flask API to serve as backend, React to serve as frontend.

mainprojects.title: Turtle Travel App (Full Stack project)
mainprojects.skills: Flask, Python; ReactJs (Javascript, HTML, CSS), Rudux
mainprojects.description: This is a fun App using Flask as backend and React as frontend. The turtle is set at (0, 0). Simply upload a .txt file which only includes R, L, F to plot the route on the web.

mainprojects.title: Search Profile App (Frontend project)
mainprojects.description: This is a frontend project which fetch the data from an api and get the json data displayed on the website. It is desinged to display each student's information, scores, and average score when expanding(+) the info section. You can simply use the search bar to filter out the target student

mainprojects.title: LA Interactive Website (Ongoing Frontend project)
mainprojects.description: This is a ongoing frontend website building for a Calgary small fitness training business - LA interactive. This is an ongoing project and it is expected to be finished at the end of October 2020.

mainprojects.title: Task Manafer Api (Backend project)
mainprojects.description: This is a REST api for manage task for each user. The production api is hosting on Heroku with the following link: https://chieh-task-manager.herokuapp.com/.

mainprojects.title: Recipe App (Ongoing Full Stack project)
mainprojects.description: This is an ongoing project designed to manage recipes for the users. The user and recipes are stored in MongoDB. Backend REST api is now hosted on Heroku. Frontend is using Reactjs and it's not yet finished. It is expected to be finished in the middle of October 2020.

mainprojects.title: Socket Board Game - Hanabi (Socket programming)
mainprojects.description: Applied Socket API to program a self-designed 4-player online game. The rules of this board game is following the original Hanabi card game. Players connected to the server using IP address through Socket API. Server listens on the socket and waits for client (players) requests (sny changes with the cards).

mainprojects.title: Implementation and Anlysis of Deep Learning in Human Detection (Undergraduate research)
mainprojects.description: Applied traditional Machine Learning algorithm (HOG-SVM, Haar Cascade) and Deep Learning algorithm (Faster-RCNN) in human detection. Analized and compared the results between traditional Machine Learning algorithm and Deep Learning algorithm.
